pkgmetadata.longdescription: # s2-pyA setuptools wrapper around the [s2geometry library](https://github.com/google/s2geometry).### RequirementsThe libs from s2geometry are still required. See [here](https://github.com/google/s2geometry/master/README.md)Note that currently it seems that the Google test framework is [mistakenly not optional](https://github.com/google/s2geometry/issues/67).### NotesAll credit goes to Google; this is just a wrapper around their lib.
